id.title: Id of Product
id.description: A system-generated opaque ID that uniquely identifies this resource.

publisherid.description: The ID of the Publisher providing this product.

activedate.title: Active Date
activedate.description: The date and time, in UTC, that the product may become part of the bookable inventory

allownocreative.title: Allow No Creative
allownocreative.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether line items assigned to this order may be booked before creative is assigned

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Identifies the currency for BasePrice and MinSpend

baseprice.title: Base Price
baseprice.description: The product's base retail price; this is not the rate card price

deliverytype.title: Delivery Type
deliverytype.description: Defines the possible types of delivery

estdailyavails.title: Est Daily Avails
estdailyavails.description: An estimated range of available daily impressions.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Common definition for a domain name

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: URL to a thumbnail icon of the product. May be used to display next to the product in the product catalog

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: A list of creative languages that the product supports from ISO-639-1

leadtime.title: Lead Time
leadtime.description: The number of days (n) from today that a line that reference this product can begin running; the line's start date must be equal to or later than today + n

minspend.title: Min Spend
minspend.description: The minimum order value of this Product in the specified currency

minflight.title: Min Flight
minflight.description: The minimum number of days that the product must be booked for. The line must enforce the duration

maxflight.description: The maximum number of days that the product may be booked for. The line must enforce the duration

producttags.title: Product Tags
producttags.description: List of tags used for searching the product catalog

ratetype.title: Rate Type
ratetype.description: Defines a unit of measure that a cost (i.e. BasePrice) is expressed in

adunit.title: Ad Unit
adunit.description: Details of the Ad Units comprising this Product.

alladunits.title: All Ad Units
alladunits.description: Describes whether all child Ad Units are severed together as a group or just one of the Ad Units is served

retirementdate.title: Retirement Date
retirementdate.description: The date and time, in UTC, that the product may be removed from the bookable inventory

tz.title: Time Zone
tz.description: The time zone that the product runs in

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the specification that describes the creative requirements

context.title: Context
context.description: Indicates the type of content being used or consumed by the user in which ads may appear This table has values derived from the TAG Inventory Quality Guidelines (IQG)

source.title: Source
source.description: This object describes the nature and behavior of the entity that is the source of the bid request upstream from the exchange

pmp.title: PMP
pmp.description: This object is the private marketplace container for direct deals between buyers and sellers that may pertain to this Product

producttargeting.description: Array of producttargeting objects used to describe the product inventory and sales rules

availsgroupby.title: Avails Group By
availsgroupby.description: Array of product targeting objects that describe the grouped fields that the Availability data can be returned in

reservedexpirytime.title: Reserved Expiry Time
reservedexpirytime.description: Defines the day of the week and time of day that represents the cut off point for the expiry of a Line for the Product when it is 'reserved.'

advertiseridaccess.title: Advertiser ID Access
advertiseridaccess.description: List of AdvertiserIDs with access to this Product. NULL = all accounts can access this product.

buyeridaccess.title: Buyer ID Access
buyeridaccess.description: List of BuyerIDs with access to this Product. NULL = all accounts can access this product.

intermediaryidaccess.title: Intermediary ID Access
intermediaryidaccess.description: List of IntermediaryIDs with access to this Product. NULL = all accounts can access this product.
